title: Westward Hope
description: A clean historical western cowboy romance novel about a mail order bride.   Montana Mail Order Brides - Westward Series Book 20  Penny Winslow, a divorced woman comes to Dawson under strange circumstances, meeting Matt Mackenzie, the town preacher. They embark on a romance, hoping for a bright future. Fear intrudes on that hope. Can they secure the happy future they seek?
author: Linda Bridey
